sn21.10:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn21.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena annataro bhikkhu theranamako ekavihari ceva hoti ekaviharassa ca vannavadi.
sn21.10:1.3: So eko gamam pindaya pavisati eko patikkamati eko raho nisidati eko cankamam adhitthati.
sn21.10:1.4: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn21.10:1.5: “idha, bhante, annataro bhikkhu theranamako ekavihari ekaviharassa ca vannavadi”ti.
sn21.10:2.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
sn21.10:2.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena theram bhikkhum amantehi:
sn21.10:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma thero tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn21.10:2.6: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma thero tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam theram bhagava etadavoca:
sn21.10:2.7: “saccam kira tvam, thera, ekavihari ekaviharassa ca vannavadi”ti?
sn21.10:2.9: “Yatha katham pana tvam, thera, ekavihari ekaviharassa ca vannavadi”ti?
sn21.10:2.10: “Idhaham, bhante, eko gamam pindaya pavisami eko patikkamami eko raho nisidami eko cankamam adhitthami.
sn21.10:2.11: Evam khvaham, bhante, ekavihari ekaviharassa ca vannavadi”ti.
sn21.10:3.2: Api ca, thera, yatha ekaviharo vittharena paripunno hoti
sn21.10:3.3: tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
sn21.10:3.6: Idha, thera, yam atitam tam pahinam, yam anagatam tam patinissattham, paccuppannesu ca attabhavapatilabhesu chandarago suppativinito.
sn21.10:3.7: Evam kho, thera, ekaviharo vittharena paripunno hoti”ti.
sn21.10:4.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
